AddedUserPlatform.PT: Acrescentamos o nome do usuário: {0}, para plataforma: {1}

AddFormationDescription.EN:
Add a new formation to the system.
**Example {0}AddFormation FormationName GK LB CB CB RB LM CM CM RM ST ST**
AddFormationDescription.PT:
Add a new formation to the system.
**Example {0}AddFormation FormationName GK LB CB CB RB LM CM CM RM ST ST**

AllowActiveSwapCommandDescription.EN: If it is allowed to use the swap command to swap positions between 2 active players
AllowActiveSwapCommandDescription.PT: If it is allowed to use the swap command to swap positions between 2 active players

AllowInactiveSwapCommandDescription.EN: If it is allowed to use the swap command to swap an active player with an inactive player
AllowInactiveSwapCommandDescription.PT: If it is allowed to use the swap command to swap an active player with an inactive player

AutoExtendClosedDescription.EN:
Default value for if a mix should create extra sessions when all positions are taken when executing the create command with 1 or more teams closed
Value: Yes or No
Aliases(AutoExtendClosed, AutoExtendClosed, AutoCreateClosed, ExtClosed, ExtendClosed, CreateClosed)
AutoExtendClosedDescription.PT:
Default value for if a mix should create extra sessions when all positions are taken when executing the create command with 1 or more teams closed
Value: Yes or No
Aliases(AutoExtendClosed, AutoExtendClosed, AutoCreateClosed, ExtClosed, ExtendClosed, CreateClosed)

AutoExtendOpenDescription.EN:
Default value for if a mix should create extra sessions when all positions are taken when executing the create command with all teams open
Value: Yes or No
Aliases(AutoExtendOpen, AutoExtendOpen, AutoCreateOpen, ExtOpen, ExtendOpen, CreateOpen)
AutoExtendOpenDescription.PT:
Default value for if a mix should create extra sessions when all positions are taken when executing the create command with all teams open
Value: Yes or No
Aliases(AutoExtendOpen, AutoExtendOpen, AutoCreateOpen, ExtOpen, ExtendOpen, CreateOpen)

ChannelNameDescription.EN:
The name you want to give to Discord Channel
Value:current name of the discord channel (use discord validation)
**Default: StartTime-Mix**
Aliases(Name, ChannelName, Channel)
ChannelNameDescription.PT:
The name you want to give to Discord Channel
Value:current name of the discord channel (use discord validation)
**Default: StartTime-Mix**
Aliases(Name, ChannelName, Channel)

CleanDescription.EN:
When the mix is over you can quickly sign out everyone.
{0}Clean or {0}CleanRoom
CleanDescription.PT:
When the mix is over you can quickly sign out everyone.
{0}Clean or {0}CleanRoom

ClosedMixGroup.EN: We Deactivated the MixGroup and all related sessions. The history is still stored in the Database but you are now able to create a new mix here.
ClosedMixGroup.PT: We Deactivated the MixGroup and all related sessions. The history is still stored in the Database but you are now able to create a new mix here.

ClosedSession.EN: We closed this MixSession and will create a new one when needed.
ClosedSession.PT: We closed this MixSession and will create a new one when needed.

CreateExtraMixChannelsDescription.EN:
Create and open an extra session when the required positions are taken
Value: True or False
**Default: {0} when 2 open teams otherwise {1}**
Aliases(Extend, CreateExtraChannels, CreateExtraChannel, ExtraChannels, ExtraChannel, AutoExtend, OpenExtra)
CreateExtraMixChannelsDescription.PT:
Create and open an extra session when the required positions are taken
Value: True or False
**Default: {0} when 2 open teams otherwise {1}**
Aliases(Extend, CreateExtraChannels, CreateExtraChannel, ExtraChannels, ExtraChannel, AutoExtend, OpenExtra)

CreateMixDescription.EN:
To create a MixGroup you can use:
**{0}CreateMix or {0}Create**
	 --> this generates a MixGroup with the default settings

**This command can be used with the options you can find underneath the example**
**None of the options is required** as they have all their default value.
**to use an option: --optionName:value**
CreateMixDescription.PT:
To create a MixGroup you can use:
**{0}CreateMix or {0}Create**
	 --> this generates a MixGroup with the default settings

**This command can be used with the options you can find underneath the example**
**None of the options is required** as they have all their default value.
**to use an option: --optionName:value**

DeleteMixDescription.EN: To delete a mix and the related session.**{0}DeleteMixGroup or {0}DeleteGroup or {0}DeleteMix or {0}DeleteSession or {0}DeleteMixSession or {0}DeleteChannel or {0}DeleteMixChannel**
DeleteMixDescription.PT: To delete a mix and the related session.**{0}DeleteMixGroup or {0}DeleteGroup or {0}DeleteMix or {0}DeleteSession or {0}DeleteMixSession or {0}DeleteChannel or {0}DeleteMixChannel**

ExampleDescription.EN:
**{0}Create --start:22h00 --registration:18h00 --teamBFormation:Basic_442**
**This example mix will start at 22h and registrations opens up at 18h and TeamB will play in a 442 formation.
For all the other options the default values will be used. You can find them below.**
ExampleDescription.PT:
**{0}Create --start:22h00 --registration:18h00 --teamBFormation:Basic_442**
**This example mix will start at 22h and registrations opens up at 18h and TeamB will play in a 442 formation.
For all the other options the default values will be used. You can find them below.**

ExtraInfoDescription.PT:
Default value for the extra info displayed in the mixSession message

ExtraInfoWithTimeInfoDickMove.EN:
It is not nice towards other players to reserve a spot while you would not be available when the next game starts
**I m watching you!**

MaxSessionDurationDescription.EN:
The max session duration (Counting from startTime) Sum of Difference between(registration and start) + duration can not be bigger then 23h
Value:13h**Default: {0}**
Aliases(LifeSpan, ls, Duration, SessionDuration, MaxDuration, MaxSessionDuration, MaxSessionDurationInHours)
MaxSessionDurationDescription.PT:
The max session duration (Counting from startTime) Sum of Difference between(registration and start) + duration can not be bigger then 23h
Value:13h**Default: {0}**
Aliases(LifeSpan, ls, Duration, SessionDuration, MaxDuration, MaxSessionDuration, MaxSessionDurationInHours)

MixBotHelpDescription.EN:
A list of the available commands: All commands are case insensitive
**Each command starts with "{0}" followed by the command name**
**Between each parameter of the command put a whitespace**
MixBotHelpDescription.PT:
A list of the available commands: All commands are case insensitive
**Each command starts with "{0}" followed by the command name**
**Between each parameter of the command put a whitespace**

MixWillStartNotification.EN: The mix on channel <#{0}> will soon start!
MixWillStartNotification.PT: The mix on channel <#{0}> will soon start!

MyStatsDescription.EN:
Get your playtime in mix per positionGroup)
{0}MyStats or {0}MixStats
**Example: {0}MyStats**
MyStatsDescription.PT:
Get your playtime in mix per positionGroup)
{0}MyStats or {0}MixStats

NotifySignedOut.EN:
You were signed out of the mix session in channel <#{0}> by: <@{1}>
It is adviced to sign yourself out of the mix room using the following command: **{2}out**

Why do you have to sign yourself out:
1)Nobody likes to wait for Godot.
2)Other players can not sign in into your position while you are still taking the spot.
3)...
NotifySignedOut.PT:
Você foi inscrito fora da sessão de mistura no canal <#{0}> por: <@{1}> é aconselhado sair da sala de mixagem usando o seguinte comando: **{2}out****nPor que você tem que se inscrever fora:
1)Ninguém gosta de esperar pelo Godot.
2)Outros jogadores não podem se inscrever em sua posição enquanto você ainda está ocupando o lugar.
3)...

OpenNewMixSessionInChannel.PT: Abrindo uma nova MixSession neste novo canal

**Default: {0} before startTime**

ServerInfo.EN:
Server Name: **{0}**

Default **start time** when creating a new mix: **{1}**
Default **hours to open registration before start time**: **{2}**
Default **max session duration** (it starts counting from start time): **{3}**
Default **extra info** that is displayed in the mix session:
{4}

Default **formation** used for teams when creating a mix: **{5}**
Default for the **recurring** parameter when creating a mix with **1 or more teams closed**: **{6}**
Default for the **recurring** parameter when creating a mix with **all teams open**: **{7}**
Default for the **auto extend** parameter when creating a mix with **1 or more teams closed**: **{8}**
Default for the **auto extend** parameter when creating a mix with **all teams open**: **{9}**
Default **use password** in the mixSession overview: **{10}**
Default for the **password** value when creating a new mix room: **{11}**
Default **use server** in the mixSession overview: **{12}**
Default **show PES side selection** in the mixSession overview: **{13}**

**Allow swap position between 2 active players**: **{14}**
Default **Allow swap between an active and an inactive player**: **{15}**

Default Teams:{16}

Time zone used within the bot for this server: **{17}**

Language of the bot: **{18}**

If you want to update 1 of those settings, please check **{19}UpdateServerHelp** or contact **sg9011**

Set your platform username.
	This PSNId for example will be shown next to your name when you are in a Mix Session.
	You can remove by providing no PSNUserName
{0}SetMyPlatform or {0}SetMyPlatformId or {0}SetMyPSNID or {0}SetMyPSN
**Example {0}SetMyPlatform PSN YourPsnUserNameHere**

SignInDescription.EN:
Sign yourself into a mix: {0}SignIn TeamName(default A Or B) Position.
Valid Command Names: {0}SignIn or {0}In or {0}On
**Example: {0}SignIn B CB**
This will sign you into the cb position of team b

Sign yourself into a mix: {0}SignIn TeamName(default A Or B) Position.
Valid Command Names: {0}SignIn or {0}In or {0}On
**Example: {0}SignIn B CB**

SignOutDescription.PT:

{0}SignOut or {0}out or {0}off

SignUserInDescription.EN:
When you want to sign someone else into the mix, {0}SignUserIn @DiscordUserMention TeamName(default A Or B) Position
{0}SignUserIn or {0}UserIn or {0}UserOn
**Example: {0}SignUserIn @Cocokeefe A Gk**
This will sign cocokeefe into the GK position of team A
SignUserInDescription.PT:
When you want to sign someone else into the mix, {0}SignUserIn @DiscordUserMention TeamName(default A Or B) Position
{0}SignUserIn or {0}UserIn or {0}UserOn

When a dumb nitwit forgot to sign out you can do it.

**Example: {0}SignUserOut @Cocokeefe**

UpdateServerDescription.EN:
To update 1 or more server settings you can use:
**{0}UpdateServer or {0}UpdateServerDefaults or {0}UpdateServerSettings**

	**This command can be used with the options you can find underneath the example**
	**None of the options is required** as they have all the current value as their default.
	**to use an option: --optionName:value**
UpdateServerDescription.PT:
To update 1 or more server settings you can use:
**{0}UpdateServer or {0}UpdateServerDefaults or {0}UpdateServerSettings**

	**This command can be used with the options you can find underneath the example**
	**None of the options is required** as they have all the current value as their default.
	**to use an option: --optionName:value**

UpdateServerExampleDescription.EN:
**{0}UpdateServer --ShowServer:No --PW:bal**
**This example will set the show server info to no (server not visible in mixSession messager). It will also set the bal password as default for future mix sessions.
For all the other options the current value will be kept.**
UpdateServerExampleDescription.PT:
**{0}UpdateServer --ShowServer:No --PW:bal**
**This example will set the show server info to no (server not visible in mixSession messager). It will also set the bal password as default for future mix sessions.
For all the other options the current value will be kept.**

UpdateServerHelpDescription.EN: How to update the server settings
UpdateServerHelpDescription.PT: Como atualizar as configurações do servidor

UpdateServerMaxSessionDurationDescriptio.EN:
Default value for the max session duration (Counting from startTime) Sum of Difference between(registration and start) + duration can not be bigger then 23h
Aliases(Duration, SessionDuration, SD)
UpdateServerMaxSessionDurationDescriptio.PT:
Default value for the max session duration (Counting from startTime) Sum of Difference between(registration and start) + duration can not be bigger then 23h
Aliases(Duration, SessionDuration, SD)

UpdateServerStartTimeDescription.EN:
Default value for the StartTime of the session
Value: 2 or 4 numbers to represent the time, ex: 1815 this will transform to 18h15m
Aliases(StartTime, Start, S, ST)
UpdateServerStartTimeDescription.PT:
Default value for the StartTime of the session
Value: 2 or 4 numbers to represent the time, ex: 1815 this will transform to 18h15m
Aliases(StartTime, Start, S, ST)

UpdateServerTeamANameDescription.EN:
Default value for the name of Team A when executing the create command
Aliases(TeamAName, AName, A, TeamA, AN, NA, Team1Name, 1Name, 1, Team1, 1N, N1)
UpdateServerTeamANameDescription.PT:
Default value for the name of Team A when executing the create command
Aliases(TeamAName, AName, A, TeamA, AN, NA, Team1Name, 1Name, 1, Team1, 1N, N1)

UpdateServerTeamBNameDescription.EN:
Default value for the name of Team B when executing the create command
Aliases(TeamBName, BName, B, TeamB, BN, NB, Team2Name, 2Name, 2, Team2, 2N, N2)
UpdateServerTeamBNameDescription.PT:
